morphInfos.tenseExplained: it is happening in the present
morphInfos.voiceExplained: it is something one does (the same as Active)
morphInfos.caseExplained: something is being done for them or relating to them
morphInfos.numberExplained: there is only one of them
morphInfos.genderExplained: they are neuter or take a neuter form
morphInfos.caseDescription: that something is done for‚ or in relation to
morphInfos.description: give them to a thing that _is doing_
morphInfos.explanation: an action that is happening - done by a neuter thing that something is done for‚ or in relation to
